greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) for 1 < k < n read by rows, where T(n,k) = 1 if gcd(n,k) is prime, 0 otherwise.
comment: Triangle defined in A122414 without first column and main diagonal.
xref: Row sums are in A087625. [From _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 29 2009]
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Sep 03 2006
